title: PHI data requires explicit KMS encryption configuration. AWS default encryption is insufficient for HIPAA compliance.
stealth_technique: Relies on AWS defaults which provide basic encryption but don't meet regulatory requirements

title: HIPAA compliance requires access logging for PHI data storage
stealth_technique: Focus on encryption and access control makes it appear secure while missing crucial audit capabilities

title: PHI data should never be publicly accessible
stealth_technique: ACL configuration is separated from main bucket resource and might be missed during review despite public access blocks
